00025 XNetworkAnalyzer::XNetworkAnalyzer(const char *name, bool runtime,
00026            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00027            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00028            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00029            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00030     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00031     m_marker1X(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker1X", false, 
00032                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00033     m_marker1Y(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker1Y", false, 
00034                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00035     m_marker2X(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker2X", false, 
00036                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00037     m_marker2Y(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker2Y", false, 
00038                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00039     m_startFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("StartFreq", false)),
00040     m_stopFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("StopFreq", false)),
00041     m_points(create<XComboNode>("Points", false, true)),
00042     m_average(create<XUIntNode>("Average", false)),
00043     m_form(new FrmNetworkAnalyzer(g_pFrmMain)),
00044     m_waveForm(create<XWaveNGraph>("WaveForm", false, 
00045                                    m_form->m_graphwidget, m_form->m_urlDump, m_form->m_btnDump))
00046 {
00047     scalarentries->insert(m_marker1X);
00048     scalarentries->insert(m_marker1Y);
00049     scalarentries->insert(m_marker2X);
00050     scalarentries->insert(m_marker2Y);
00051     
00052     startFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00053     stopFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00054     points()->setUIEnabled(false);
00055     average()->setUIEnabled(false);
00056     m_conStartFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(startFreq(), m_form->m_edStart);
00057     m_conStopFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(stopFreq(), m_form->m_edStop);
00058     m_conPoints = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(points(), m_form->m_cmbPoints);
00059     m_conAverage = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(average(), m_form->m_edAverage);
00060     
00061     const char *labels[] = {"Freq [MHz]", "Level [dB]"};
00062     m_waveForm->setColCount(2, labels); 
00063     m_waveForm->insertPlot("Trace1", 0, 1);
00064     m_waveForm->clear(); 
00065 
00066     m_graph = m_waveForm->graph();
00067     m_graph->backGround()->value(QColor(0x0A, 0x05, 0x45).rgb());
00068     m_graph->titleColor()->value(clWhite);
00069     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = m_waveForm->axisx();
00070     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = m_waveForm->axisy();
00071     axisx->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00072     axisx->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00073     axisx->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);  
00074     axisy->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00075     axisy->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00076     axisy->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);
00077     axisy->autoScale()->value(false);
00078     axisy->maxValue()->value(13.0);
00079     axisy->minValue()->value(-70.0);
00080     m_waveForm->plot(0)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00081     m_waveForm->plot(0)->lineColor()->value(clGreen);
00082     m_waveForm->plot(0)->pointColor()->value(clGreen);
00083     shared_ptr<XXYPlot> plot = m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(
00084         "Markers", true, m_graph);
00085     m_markerPlot = plot;
00086     plot->label()->value(KAME::i18n("Markers"));
00087     plot->axisX()->value(axisx);
00088     plot->axisY()->value(axisy);
00089     plot->drawLines()->value(false);
00090     plot->drawBars()->value(true);
00091     plot->pointColor()->value(clRed);
00092     plot->barColor()->value(clRed);
00093     plot->intensity()->value(2.0);
00094     plot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00095     plot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00096 }
00097 void
00098 XNetworkAnalyzer::showForms() {
00099 //! impliment form->show() here
00100     m_form->show();
00101     m_form->raise();
00102 }

00104 void
00105 XNetworkAnalyzer::start()
00106 {
00107     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XNetworkAnalyzer>(shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::execute));
00108     m_thread->resume();
00109   
00110     startFreq()->setUIEnabled(true);
00111     stopFreq()->setUIEnabled(true);
00112     points()->setUIEnabled(true);
00113     average()->setUIEnabled(true);
00114 }
00115 void
00116 XNetworkAnalyzer::stop()
00117 {   
00118     startFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00119     stopFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00120     points()->setUIEnabled(false);
00121     average()->setUIEnabled(false);
00122     
00123     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00124 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00125 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00126 }

00128 void
00129 XNetworkAnalyzer::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00130 {
00131     unsigned int numtr = pop<unsigned int>();
00132     if(numtr != 1)
00133         return; 
00134     unsigned int nummk = pop<unsigned int>();
00135     m_markersRecorded.resize(nummk);
00136     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nummk; i++) {
00137         m_markersRecorded[i].first = pop<double>();
00138         m_markersRecorded[i].second = pop<double>();
00139     }
00140     if(nummk >= 1) {
00141         m_marker1X->value(m_markersRecorded[0].first);
00142         m_marker1Y->value(m_markersRecorded[0].second);
00143     }
00144     if(nummk >= 2) {
00145         m_marker2X->value(m_markersRecorded[1].first);
00146         m_marker2Y->value(m_markersRecorded[1].second);
00147     }
00148     convertRaw();
00149 }
00150 void
00151 XNetworkAnalyzer::visualize()
00152 {
00153 //  if(!time()) {
00154 //      m_waveForm->clear();
00155 //      return;
00156 //  }
00157     const unsigned int length = lengthRecorded();
00158     { XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_waveForm);
00159 
00160     m_markerPlot->clearAllPoints();
00161     m_markerPlot->maxCount()->value(m_markersRecorded.size());
00162     for(std::deque<std::pair<double, double> >::const_iterator it = m_markersRecorded.begin();
00163         it != m_markersRecorded.end(); it++) {
00164         m_markerPlot->addPoint(it->first, it->second);
00165     }
00166     
00167     m_waveForm->setRowCount(length);
00168     
00169     double *freqs = m_waveForm->cols(0);
00170     double fint = freqIntervalRecorded();
00171     double f = startFreqRecorded();
00172     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00173         *freqs++ = f;
00174         f += fint;
00175     }
00176         
00177     memcpy(m_waveForm->cols(1), traceRecorded(), length * sizeof(double));
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00181 void *
00182 XNetworkAnalyzer::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00183 {
00184     m_lsnOnStartFreqChanged = startFreq()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00185         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onStartFreqChanged);
00186     m_lsnOnStopFreqChanged = stopFreq()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00187         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onStopFreqChanged);
00188     m_lsnOnPointsChanged = points()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00189         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onPointsChanged);
00190     m_lsnOnAverageChanged = average()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00191         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onAverageChanged);
00192 
00193     while(!terminated) {
00194         XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00195         clearRaw();
00196         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00197         try {
00198             oneSweep();
00199         }
00200         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00201             continue;
00202         }
00203         catch (XKameError &e) {
00204             e.print(getLabel());
00205             continue;
00206         }
00207         push((unsigned int)1); //# of traces.
00208         double mx[8], my[8];
00209         unsigned int nummk = 0;
00210         try {
00211             for(;nummk < 8;nummk++) {
00212                 mx[nummk] = 0.0;
00213                 my[nummk] = 0.0;
00214                 getMarkerPos(nummk, mx[nummk], my[nummk]);
00215             }
00216         }
00217         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00218         }
00219         catch (XKameError &e) {
00220             e.print(getLabel());
00221             continue;
00222         }
00223         push((unsigned int)nummk); //# of markers.
00224         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nummk; i++) {
00225             push(mx[i]);
00226             push(my[i]);            
00227         }
00228         try {
00229             acquireTrace(0);
00230         }
00231         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00232             continue;
00233         }
00234         catch (XKameError &e) {
00235             e.print(getLabel());
00236             continue;
00237         }
00238         finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00239     }
00240     try {
00241         startContSweep();
00242     }
00243     catch (XKameError &e) {
00244         e.print(getLabel());
00245     }
00246     m_lsnOnStartFreqChanged.reset();
00247     m_lsnOnStopFreqChanged.reset();
00248     m_lsnOnPointsChanged.reset();
00249     m_lsnOnAverageChanged.reset();
00250     
00251     afterStop();
00252     return NULL;
00253 }
